thread.title: Kim Kardashian has her post-pregnancy stretch marks removed
thread.title_full: Kim Kardashian has her post-pregnancy stretch marks removed

title: Kim Kardashian has her post-pregnancy stretch marks removed
text:
Kim Kardashian has her post-pregnancy stretch marks removed Last updated 11:28, February 20 2017 REUTERS 
"I've been so scared to do it thinking it hurts so badly. I feel so excited that I finally did it." 
Kim Kardashian reached out to her fans on Snapchat after she had her post-pregnancy stretch marks removed by her cosmetic dermatologist, Simone Ourian, in Beverly Hills. 
According to Us Weekly , the 36-year-old reality star went in just a week after having her belly button tightened, although it still remains unconfirmed which part of her body was worked on. 
"I feel so excited that I finally did it," she posted on Snapchat. 
READ MORE: * Kim Kardashian and Kanye West's fighting 
"I've been so scared to do it thinking it hurts so badly, and it didn't hurt that badly. So I'm so grateful, and I'm so excited. I love you Dr. Ourian." 
Kardashian added a cute bunny animation, which changed her voice to a higher-pitched sound. A post shared by Kim Kardashian Snapchats (@kimksnapchats) on Feb 19, 2017 at 10:05am PST 
According to Us Weekly , the Kardashian clan have relied on Ourian's expertise over the years to perfect their bodies. "My cosmetic dermatologist, Dr. Simon Ourian, is the truth!!! My sisters and I have been going to him for years for laser treatments and skin care at Epione, and he has seriously made my skin perfect," wrote Khloe Kardashian in a post on her website. A post shared by Dr. Simon Ourian - Epione (@simonourianmd1) on Feb 11, 2017 at 8:40pm PST
